basics.name: Jennifer Gong
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Diligent and detail-oriented software developer with a strong background in digital marketing and a passion for creating engaging user experiences. As a marketer, I took pride in my ability to communicate the value of great products, but was always curious about what it took to build them. Now as a developer, I’m constantly learning new technologies that enable me to be part of this process and create direct value for customers. I strive to work in a collaborative, creative, and purpose-driven environment where I can make a positive impact.

highlights: Gained solid knowledge of algorithms, data structures, databases, MVC pattern design and object-oriented programming
Designed interactive, responsive applications with  HTML, CSS, Javascript, React and third-party API integrations
Developed full-stack applications and designed REST APIs with full CRUD functionality using React, Sequelize, Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL and Ruby on Rails
Managed team-based web development projects using agile workflow, Trello and Github

projects.title: Travelogue
projects.description: Full-stack travel journal app with full CRUD functionality, user authentication and a REST JSON API, built with a React front-end and a Ruby on Rails back-end

projects.title: Expedia Clone
projects.description: Full-stack app adding feature to find eco-friendly hotels, built in collaboration with UX designers and engineers using React, Express.js, PostgreSQL and Sequelize

projects.title: Gender Diversity in Film
projects.description: Front-end app built with The Movie Database API, Bechdel Test API, React and CSS

projects.title: EntertainmentIQ
projects.description: Front-end game app built with Open Trivia Database API, HTML, CSS and vanilla Javascript

highlights: Transitioned from field marketing to content marketing within two years, expanding leadership role and influence on core go-to-market business strategy
Led strategic planning and execution of key demand generation marketing campaigns for the US Career business, influenced $12m in active sales pipeline for 2018
Managed external agencies and collaborated with cross-functional partners in PR, digital marketing, and technology to execute fully integrated content-based campaigns
Led field marketing strategy and delivery of 180+ activities across 13 sub-markets over one year
Promoted four times over eight years from Specialist through to Associate Director for exceeding business goals and demonstrating strong leadership and collaboration skills
Coached and supervised team members, managed budgets and led strategic marketing planning for key market segments
Built an integrated lead management system and implemented new reporting process through Salesforce and Eloqua to improve tracking of marketing results
Fully redesigned the website for this not-for-profit, 501(c)3 organization using HTML, CSS and jQuery
Restructured site map, updated and organized primary content
Implemented Slick Carousel and Fancy Box jQuery libraries to add functionality to image rendering

awards.title: President’s Circle Award for Marketer of the Year, EMEA
President’s Circle Award for Marketer of the Year
